title: Ep 113 - Jay Dobyns Mayor of Copland
description:
Episode Description:

This episode features an interview with a true American badass, a hero, and a legend in the undercover world of law enforcement. Jay Dobyns is a retired ATF agent who was the first undercover federal agent to successfully infiltrate and actually become a patch-wearing member of the Hells Angels. This interview is just over an hour long and it's incredible. We hope you enjoy listening to it half as much as we did recording it.

Want more Jay Dobyns?

Jay is also a New York Times and an International Best Selling author. You can find his books No Angel: My Harrowing Undercover Journey to the Inner Circle of the Hells Angelsand Catching Hell: A True Story of Abandonment and Betrayaleverywhere books can be found or at jaydobyns.com.

Make sure you check out Jay's podcast Copland to hear Jay interview other Law Enforcement legends as the tell amazing stories from their career. If you're like us, you can't get enough Jay Dobyns.
